Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute at Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan buses are rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #75 74th/75th  Reroute at Eggleston/75th
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted near Eggleston/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Vincennes, 76th, Halsted, 74th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Eggleston/75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with major delays at California due to police department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
